web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: Copy buttons now have aria-labels for accessibility: IP copy button (Copiar endereço IP), SSH copy button (Copiar comando SSH), and SSH Config menu item (Copiar configuração SSH para o arquivo de config).

web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: Badge component now uses forwardRef and spreads additional props. Supports ref, tabIndex, onClick, onKeyDown, role, aria-* attributes for accessibility. Follow this pattern for other presentational components that need interactivity.

web/src/components/Tooltip.jsx.description: Tooltip.jsx already has good accessibility patterns: uses role='tooltip', has aria-label on HelpTooltip component, and handles focus/blur events. Can use as reference for accessibility patterns.
